#{creatorUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_ARCHIVE_ID = #{createArchiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUY_CUST_NO = #{buyCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_CUST_NAME = #{buyCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_CUST_SEX = #{buyCustSex,jdbcType=BIT}, BUY_CUST_AGE = #{buyCustAge,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_CUST_CAREER = #{buyCustCareer,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CELL_PHONE = #{cellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_ADDR = #{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_LIFEBOUND = #{buyLifebound,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_GOAL = #{buyGoal,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_LENGTH = #{buyLength,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_ABILITY = #{buyAbility,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_PAYTYPE = #{buyPaytype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CUST_LEVEL = #{custLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATE_TYPE = #{plateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_CUST_SOURCE = #{buyCustSource,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_CUST_LEVEL = #{buyCustLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HOUSE_ROOM = #{houseRoom,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HOUSE_ROOM_1 = #{houseRoom1,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HOUSE_REGION = #{houseRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_NAME = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_NAME = #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_ID = #{buildId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_NAME = #{buildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_ROUND = #{houseRound,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_TYPE = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_USEAGE = #{houseUseage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_FITMENT = #{houseFitment,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HOUSE_DIRECT = #{houseDirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_FLOOR_LOW = #{houseFloorLow,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, HOUSE_FLOOR_HIGH = #{houseFloorHigh,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, HOUSE_PRICE_LOW = #{housePriceLow,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HOUSE_PRICE_HIGH = #{housePriceHigh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HOUSE_AREA_LOW = #{houseAreaLow,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HOUSE_AREA_HIGH = #{houseAreaHigh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HOUSE_YEAR_LOW = #{houseYearLow,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, HOUSE_YEAR_HIGH = #{houseYearHigh,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, HOUSE_LOOK = #{houseLook,jdbcType=BIT}, CUST_REQUEST = #{custRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_MEMO = #{custMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_CUST_STATUS = #{buyCustStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TRACK_TIME = #{trackTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPEAT_FLAG = #{repeatFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, INFO_TYPE = #{infoType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SHARE_FLAG = #{shareFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, RED_FLAG = #{redFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, ORANGE_FLAG = #{orangeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, PUBLIC_COUNT = #{publicCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PUBLIC_TIME = #{publicTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIAL_TIME = #{specialTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEDULE_TIME = #{scheduleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEAL_TIME = #{dealTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRITEOFF_TIME = #{writeoffTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRECY_TIME = #{secrecyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMEND_TIME = #{commendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_TIME = #{actionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIVATE_TIME = #{privateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_PUBLIC = #{fromPublic,jdbcType=BIT}, COOPERATE_FLAG = #{cooperateFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRIEND_HOUSE = #{friendHouse,jdbcType=TINYINT}, COOPERATE_TIME = #{cooperateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMPLAINT_FLAG = #{complaintFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_ignore = #{isIgnore,jdbcType=TINYINT}, YOU_SHARE_FLAG = #{youShareFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, YOU_SHARE_TIME = #{youShareTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, YOU_BUY_COUNT = #{youBuyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRIVATE_USER_ID = #{privateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYNC_TIME = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, YOU_SHARE_ID = #{youShareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SPECIAL_END_TIME = #{specialEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SCHEDULE_END_TIME = #{scheduleEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CITY_SHARE_FLAG = #{cityShareFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ROADS_ID = #{roadsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROADS_NAME = #{roadsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESPITE_END_TIME = #{respiteEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_SALE_LEASE = #{isSaleLease,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AVAILABLE_TIME = #{availableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_DKAN_TIME = #{lastDkanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WECHAT_NUMBER = #{wechatNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_PHOTO = #{custPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD_TYPE = #{idCardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUY_QUALIFY = #{buyQualify,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_NUM = #{buyNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_CURRENT_STATUS = #{buyCurrentStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREDIT = #{credit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, VEHICLE = #{vehicle,jdbcType=TINYINT}, MENTALITY = #{mentality,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_USER_ID = #{cUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_LEVEL = #{userLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TISSUE_LINE = #{tissueLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUST_SOURCE = #{custSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUST_INTENTION = #{custIntention,jdbcType=INTEGER} where BUY_CUST_ID = #{buyCustId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) as Attr from FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER where COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (PLATE_TYPE='3' OR PLATE_TYPE='1')
mapper.update:
update FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER
REG_ID = #{map.manageRegId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPT_ID = #{map.manageDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATE_TIME = #{map.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AREA_ID = #{map.manageAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{map.manageUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where USER_ID = #{map.erpUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER set TRACK_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone}, TRACK_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , TRACK_TIME) END, SPECIAL_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SPECIAL_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SPECIAL_TIME) END, SCHEDULE_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SCHEDULE_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SCHEDULE_TIME) END, SECRECY_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SECRECY_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SECRECY_TIME) END, COMMEND_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , COMMEND_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , COMMEND_TIME) END, ACTION_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , ACTION_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , ACTION_TIME) END, PRIVATE_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , PRIVATE_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , PRIVATE_TIME) END where USER_ID = #{pMap.userId} and DEPT_ID = #{pMap.deptId} and COMP_ID = #{pMap.compId}
update FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER set AREA_ID = #{pMap.areaId}, REG_ID = #{pMap.regId} where COMP_ID = #{pMap.compId} and DEPT_ID= #{pMap.deptId}
mapper.select:
select sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime},1,0)) as xzCustWeek, sum(1) as xzCustMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and BUY_CUST_STATUS=4,1,0)) as ydCustWeek, sum(iif(BUY_CUST_STATUS=4,1,0)) as ydCustMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and BUY_CUST_STATUS=2,1,0)) as fpCustWeek, sum(iif(BUY_CUST_STATUS=2,1,0)) as fpCustMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and BUY_CUST_STATUS=5,1,0)) as ncjCustWeek, sum(iif(BUY_CUST_STATUS=5,1,0)) as ncjCustMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and BUY_CUST_STATUS=6,1,0)) as wcjCustWeek, sum(iif(BUY_CUST_STATUS=6,1,0)) as wcjCustMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and BUY_CUST_STATUS=7,1,0)) as zxCustWeek, sum(iif(BUY_CUST_STATUS=7,1,0)) as zxCustMonth
from FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER where CREATION_TIME >= #{monthTime} and COMP_ID = #{compId}
SELECT count(1) cust,${caseWhenSql} as price FROM FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND BUY_CUST_STATUS IN (1,2,4) GROUP BY ${caseWhenSql} ORDER BY count(1) desc

select top 10 count(1) counts,c.SOURCE_ID byName from FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER a join FUN_CUST_DEMAND_SPLIT b on b.SOURCE_TYPE=2 and b.CASE_TYPE=3 join FUN_CUST_DEMAND_SPLIT c on c.SOURCE_TYPE=3 and c.CASE_TYPE=3 WHERE a.COMP_ID=#{param.compId} AND a.${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND a.BUY_CUST_STATUS IN (1,2,4) AND b.SOURCE_ID = 1 AND b.SOURCE_ID = 3 AND b.SOURCE_ID = 4 group by c.SOURCE_ID order by count(1) desc

SELECT AREA_ID areaId, REG_ID regId, DEPT_ID deptId, GR_ID grId, BUY_CUST_ID caseId, BUY_CUST_STATUS AS status, BUY_CUST_NO AS caseNo FROM FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER WHERE BUY_CUST_ID IN( SELECT CASE_ID FROM FUN_PHONE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND CASE_TYPE = 3 AND PHONE IN #{val} GROUP BY CASE_ID ) ORDER BY CREATION_TIME ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER WHERE COMP_ID=#{compId} AND USER_ID=#{userId}
select BUY_CUST_LEVEL as LEVEL,count(*) as ATTRNAME from FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER where COMP_ID = #{compId} and DEPT_ID = #{deptId} and USER_ID = #{userId} and BUY_CUST_LEVEL in (2,3) group by BUY_CUST_LEVEL

select
distinct
TOP 1
from FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT
FROM FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND BUY_CUST_ID IN
#{caseId}
ORDER BY CREATION_TIME DESC
select from FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER WHERE BUY_CUST_ID = #{buyCustId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER set USER_ID = NULL, ARCHIVE_ID = NUll, BUY_CUST_SOURCE = 5 , BUY_CUST_LEVEL = 1 , UPDATE_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , PUBLIC_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , SYNC_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , ACTION_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , TRACK_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , AREA_ID = #{paramMap.areaId} , REG_ID = #{paramMap.regId} , DEPT_ID = #{paramMap.deptId} , GR_ID = #{paramMap.grId} , PLATE_TYPE = 3 , ORANGE_FLAG = 0 , COOPERATE_FLAG = 0 , CITY_SHARE_FLAG = 0 where USER_ID = #{paramMap.userId}

update FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER set USER_ID = NULL, ARCHIVE_ID = NUll, BUY_CUST_SOURCE = 5 , BUY_CUST_LEVEL = 1 , UPDATE_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , PUBLIC_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , SYNC_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , ACTION_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , TRACK_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , PLATE_TYPE = 3 , ORANGE_FLAG = 0 , COOPERATE_FLAG = 0 , CITY_SHARE_FLAG = 0, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{paramMap.organizationId}, USER_LEVEL = #{paramMap.userLevel}, TISSUE_LINE = #{paramMap.tissueLineCust} where USER_ID = #{paramMap.userId}
